sentences.en: Clothing seems to wear out in no time nowadays.
sentences.cn: 现在的衣服好像很快就穿破了.

sentences.en: I don't hold with the way they do things nowadays.
sentences.cn: 我不赞成他们现在的办事方式。

sentences.en: Most people nowadays are aware of the importance of a healthy diet.
sentences.cn: 现在大多数人都明白健康饮食的重要性。

sentences.en: Nowadays it is very easy to earn a living.
Nowadays most kids prefer watching TV to reading.
sentences.cn: 现在大多数孩子都喜欢看电视而不喜欢读书。

sentences.en: Nowadays people are rarely shocked by the sex they see on television.
sentences.cn: 如今人们在电视上看见性爱镜头不太会感到吃惊了。

sentences.en: Nowadays people get about much more than they used to.
sentences.cn: 现在外出旅行的人们比过去多.

sentences.en: Nowadays that sort of innocence is in short supply.
sentences.cn: 现在那种天真烂漫很少见。

sentences.en: Nowadays tractors are used even in remote mountainous regions.
sentences.cn: 现在连偏僻的山区也用上了拖拉机.

sentences.en: Nowadays, only the two big houses remain roofed.
sentences.cn: 现在，只有那两座大房子还有屋顶。

sentences.en: People live longer nowadays, and they are better educated.
sentences.cn: 当今，人们越来越长寿，受教育程度也提高了。

sentences.en: The novels of Scott are much in demand nowadays.
sentences.cn: 斯科特的小说目前十分畅销.

sentences.en: The term "early retirement" is nearly always a euphemism for redundancy nowadays.
sentences.cn: 现在“提前退休”几乎就是裁员的委婉说法。

sentences.en: Things seem to be going from bad to worse nowadays.
We can see many adulterators in the market nowadays.
sentences.cn: 时下我们能见到有许多低劣商品冲击市场.

sentences.en: We must go with the times, and go as others do nowadays.
sentences.cn: 我们必须跟上时代潮流.

sentences.en: You're miles better than most of the performers we see nowadays.
sentences.cn: 你比当下我们见到的大多数表演者都强多了。

trans.tran_en: now, compared with what happened in the past
